actors.name: Demon of Unwitting Mischief - Chaos Jestin
Demon of Unwitting Mischief - Chaos Jestin
Demon of Unwitting Mischief - Chaos Jestin

messages.message: Confess. What did you do to those fairies?
I wanted to decorate my mansion, so I bought some flowers from demon kingdom to plant at the front door.
Those faires came here play with those flowers and turn violent after that, so I have removed it.
They have trumpet shape, pale purple color, their smell always makes me feel motivated and excited.
Demons have high resistance, so flowers's effects are insignificant, but other species can become aggressive, or afflicted with fever and hallucinations if they stand too close.
Do some research before bringing anything from demon kingdom next time.
And remember to apologize to those fairies.
